title: Elections in dem and auth regimes

content.question:
Elections are held in both democratic and authoritarian regimes.
Describe one reason that authoritarian regimes hold elections.
Explain how presidential elections since 2000 strengthened or weakened democracy in Russia.
Explain how presidential elections since 2000 strengthened or weakened democracy in Mexico.
Identify one factor other than elections that strengthens democracy. Explain how that factor contributes to democracy.
